channel.title: Duchess Skill Name is misleading
channel.description: #### What happened? I was a BD and a princess turned into a duchess. When the duchess used the skill, "stealth slap" it revealed to me that there was a duchess who slapped me. This outed the princess claim to be duchess. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I believe that the word stealth implies that the person being slapped would not know. I think the word stealth should be removed from the skill. #### Steps to reproduce: xxx #### Comments:

item.title: Duchess Skill Name is misleading
item.dc:creator: jink144
item.description:
What happened?

I was a BD and a princess turned into a duchess. When the duchess used the skill, “stealth slap” it revealed to me that there was a duchess who slapped me. This outed the princess claim to be duchess.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I believe that the word stealth implies that the person being slapped would not know. I think the word stealth should be removed from the skill.

Steps to reproduce:

xxx

Comments:

Read full topic
